thread.title: Taraji P. Henson Says "Hidden Figures" Reminds Us Of What We Need To Do Right Now
thread.title_full: Taraji P. Henson Says "Hidden Figures" Reminds Us Of What We Need To Do Right Now

author: Alanna Bennett
title: Taraji P. Henson Says "Hidden Figures" Reminds Us Of What We Need To Do Right Now
text:
View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10421342 2. “I think this movie is bigger than myself. I think this movie is bigger than any awards show,” she said. View this image ›
20th Century Fox ID: 10421328 3. “It’s a story about unity. About when we’re in the worst of times, how we can come together on the right side of history.” View this image ›
20th Century Fox ID: 10421403 4. “It’s a reminder of what we need to do right now, today,” Henson said. View this image ›
Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images ID: 10421415 5. Henson has been vocal on social media about President Trump’s recent executive order on immigration. Loading View on Instagram
